pr_title: [RW-4526][risk=no] Update support text and link in sidebar

timeline.bodyText: Do you need this? The link won't work as-is, since SSO is not configured for the stable gsuite to work with prod ZD. We might be able to update it to make that work though - would be nice if stable pointed to ZD prod.
timeline.author: calbach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@ export const environment: Environment = {
   gaId: 'UA-112406425-3',
   gaUserAgentDimension: 'dimension1',
   gaLoggedInDimension: 'dimension2',
-  zendeskHelpCenterUrl: 'https://aousupporthelp1580753096.zendesk.com/hc',
+  zendeskHelpCenterUrl: 'http://aousupporthelp.zendesk.com/hc',

replies.bodyText: Ok, changed back. Switching this came up in our Slack convo but I didn't realize it wouldn't work as is.
replies.author: dolbeew

timeline.bodyText: I realize you're matching the text in the Jira ticket here, but shouldn't page be part of the anchor text?
timeline.author: calbach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -475,10 +476,9 @@ export const HelpSidebar = fp.flow(withCurrentWorkspace(), withUserProfile())(

Not finding what you're looking for?

- Visit the this.analyticsEvent('FAQ')}> FAQs here - or this.openContactWidget()}> contact - us. + Visit our this.analyticsEvent('UserSupport')}> User Support + page or this.openContactWidget()}> contact us.

replies.bodyText: So I checked with Helen, and she pointed me to this NIH style guide that specifies not to include "page" in hyperlinks.
replies.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: Ah, great. thanks for following up on that.
replies.author: calbach

timeline.message: RW-4526 update support text and url in sidebar footer
RW-4526 use prod zendesk url in stable env variable
RW-4526 revert ZD link change for stable
RW-4526 revert ZD link change for stable
